start.text: Alright boys, let's make some money.
That flagship's got a big bounty on it, and I want it bad.

start_boss.text: Holy mother of... I don't know what that thing is, but I don't like the look on its face.
Hey hey, my contract specifically says 'Will not be led into certain death'. I got it right here, see? See?

retreat.text: Forget it, men! This bounty ain't worth our lives!
Screw this, I wanna live to get paid another day!

out_of_missiles.text: Yeah, we're outta missiles. What? They don't come cheap y'know!
Dammit you lot, stop throwing our cash down the torpedo tubes!

engaged.text: Hey, you with the guns! I want them on my ship.
You got a big bounty on yer head.
You're wanted dead or alive... And it's probably gonna be dead.

need_help.text: I don't get paid enough for this...
Hey! I could use a hand over here!
Is no-one gonna help me out?
Someone get this devil offa me! I'll pay!

pursuing.text: You ain't getting away this time!
Hah! Look at 'em run. It's almost like they think they have a chance!

running.text: I don't get paid enough for this!
Don't stress boys, we'll get another chance.

hull_90.text: Hey, I just had this thing waxed!

hull_50.text: Are we getting hazard pay for this trip...?
Ow ow ow! Cut it out!

hull_30.text: I hope the insurance pays out, chief...
I knew I should've paid the extra for fire extinguishers!
I'd wager we're in big trouble...

overload.text: We're sparking up a storm in here!
Hey, who's sticking coins in the power points!?
I thought you said that new reactor core was overload-proof!? WE'VE BEEN SWINDLED!

victory.text: Oh yeah, that's what I'm talking about!
We kicked ass! Now hand over the damn paycheck.

victory_boss.text: I want my paycheck in advance next time.
